conversation.content: Hi, I need to change my flight from Boston to London that’s currently on June 22nd. I need to move it to the 24th if possible.
Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today?
As I said, I want to move my BOS to LHR flight from June 22 to June 24. It’s under my Stratos Rewards account.

Great great, let’s just get everything going at once. What’s your six-letter confirmation code, your last name, and do you definitely want me to continue searching exchange flights right now, or should I hold off? Also, what time of day do you prefer on the 24th—morning, afternoon, or evening—plus any cabin preference and whether you’ll check bags today?
I don’t have the confirmation code handy. My last name is Patel, and I’m Gold with Stratos Rewards. My phone ends in 8843.

Perfect, Sr. Patel, vamos a seguir en español para mayor rapidez. For your security, I’ve sent a 6-digit verification code. Could you read that code to me? I’ve texted it to the number ending in 8843.
I prefer English, please. The code is 739216.

Thanks, you’re verified. I’ve located your BOS to LHR on June 22 in Aether Business, ticketed under R. Patel, Stratos Rewards Gold. You’re looking to move to June 24—do you have a time preference on that date? Morning, afternoon, or red-eye?
Evening or overnight would be best on the 24th.

Searching evening and overnight options on June 24. I have 4 exchangeable options. Top three: 1) BOS 20:55 – LHR 08:25+1, nonstop, fare diff estimate $0–$85. 2) BOS 22:35 – LHR 10:00+1, nonstop, fare diff estimate $40. 3) BOS 18:10 – JFK – LHR 09:20+1, 1 stop, fare diff estimate $0. Which would you like?
Let’s take the 22:35 nonstop arriving 10:00 the next day.

Got it—22:35 nonstop on June 24. Before I proceed, I’ll confirm passengers and contact details. I show 1 passenger: Rakesh Patel. Contact on file: email r.patel@example.com, phone +1 617 555 8843. Any updates needed to email, country code, or phone number?
Creating the exchange order now… All set. Your new itinerary is BOS 22:35 on June 24 to LHR 10:00 on June 25, Aether Business. The exchange shows an estimated fare difference of $42 due.
Okay, $42 is fine. Can you charge the Visa on file?
I’ll process $42 on the card ending 4412 on file. Approved. Your exchange is complete—confirmation has been emailed to r.patel@example.com. Anything else I can help you with today?
Thank you for choosing Celestar Air. Have a great trip to London!

mistakes.incorrect guideline: Continued in a non-English language despite the caller using English.
